main event: A fighter aircraft was observed over Dayton, Ohio for over two hours on each of two successive nights.
interesting points: The object looked like an airplane but was moving slower.
The object was observed through binoculars with no change in appearance.
The object was described as shaped like a dirigible and moved up and to the right.
The case was evaluated as being the planet Jupiter.
sighted object: A slow-moving light in the sky
